response.title: Research potential funding sources such as investors, grants, or loans.
response.description: Identifying potential funding sources is the first step in raising funds.
response.why_suggested: Identifying potential funding sources is the first step in raising funds.

response.title: Prepare a pitch deck or business plan to present to potential investors.
response.description: A well-prepared pitch deck is crucial for convincing investors to provide funding.
response.why_suggested: A well-prepared pitch deck is crucial for convincing investors to provide funding.

response.title: Schedule meetings with potential investors or funding bodies.
response.description: Meetings are necessary to present your funding proposal and secure investments.
subtasks: Prepare a pitch deck or business plan
depends_on: Prepare a pitch deck or business plan
response.why_suggested: Meetings are necessary to present your funding proposal and secure investments.

response.title: Follow up with investors after meetings to secure commitments.
response.description: Following up can help reinforce interest and move towards closing deals.
subtasks: Schedule meetings with potential investors or funding bodies
depends_on: Schedule meetings with potential investors or funding bodies
response.why_suggested: Following up can help reinforce interest and move towards closing deals.

response.title: Define the marketing role and responsibilities.
response.description: Clear role definition helps attract the right candidates and sets expectations.
response.why_suggested: Clear role definition helps attract the right candidates and sets expectations.

response.title: Create a job description and post it on relevant job boards.
response.description: A job description is necessary to attract potential candidates.
subtasks: Define the marketing role and responsibilities
depends_on: Define the marketing role and responsibilities
response.why_suggested: A job description is necessary to attract potential candidates.

response.title: Review applications and shortlist candidates.
response.description: Shortlisting helps identify the best candidates for interviews.
subtasks: Create a job description and post it on relevant job boards
depends_on: Create a job description and post it on relevant job boards
response.why_suggested: Shortlisting helps identify the best candidates for interviews.

response.title: Conduct interviews with shortlisted candidates.
response.description: Interviews are essential to assess candidates' suitability for the role.
response.why_suggested: Interviews are essential to assess candidates' suitability for the role.

response.title: Make an offer to the selected candidate.
response.description: Making an offer is the final step in hiring the right candidate.
response.why_suggested: Making an offer is the final step in hiring the right candidate.
